source: Title: 星洲炒米粉, Ingredients: 3卷星洲炒米专用米粉 1520只鲜虾 大半个洋葱 一小根胡萝卜 35个青椒 1大根火腿肠 适量蒜末大葱段干辣椒 适量咖喱粉 适量盐 适量食用油 适量蚝油, Steps: 以上是所需要的食材 一定要用到咖喱粉，一般超市都买得到，不能用咖喱块代替 米粉我是在网上买的专门做星洲炒米的粉，这种粉比一般的粉丝有弹性也韧一些，炒的时候没那么容易断。记得要提前用冷水泡1015分钟 1锅烧热加少量油，小火煸炒葱段蒜末和干辣椒 煸出香味后倒入处理好的虾仁 虾仁炒成红色就倒入洋葱胡萝卜和青椒丝一起煸炒几分钟。 蔬菜稍微炒软就加入火腿肠，再加少量盐和咖喱粉打个底味。炒蔬菜的时候可以稍微点一点热水更好熟 蔬菜基本都熟了就把事先泡好并沥去水分的粉丝倒入锅中一起炒，炒粉的时候沿着锅四周加入适量的油防止粘锅 粉丝炒23分钟就好，之后就可以开始调味了，先加入适量蚝油 根据自己的口味加适量的盐 最后加稍微多一点的咖喱粉 完成 黄灿灿的看着就好吃
references: Title: Chinese stir fry with rice noodles, Ingredients: 1. 100g rice vermicelli 2. 300g peeled and frozen shrimp, thawed 3. ½ large onion, thinly sliced 4. 1 small carrot, julienned 5. 3-5 green bell peppers, deseeded and thinly sliced 6. 1 large sausage, sliced 7. 1 clove garlic, minced 8. 2 spring onions, chopped 9. 1 tsp dried chili flakes 10. 1 tsp curry powder 11. ½ tsp salt 12. 1 tbsp cooking oil 13. 1 cup hot water 14. 1 tsp oyster sauce, Steps: 1. The above are all the necessary ingredients. 2. You must use curry powder, which can be bought in general supermarkets. You cannot substitute it for a curry cube. 3. Soak the vermicelli in cold water for 10-15 minutes. 4. Heat the oil in a wok and fry the spring onions, garlic and chili on low heat until fragrant. 5. Add the shrimp to the wok and fry for 3-5 minutes. 6. Add the onion, carrot and bell pepper, and fry for 3-5 minutes. 7. Add sausage, salt, curry powder and water. 8. When vegetables are cooked, add the soaked and drained vermicelli and fry. Add oil if necessary. 9. Stir fry the vermicelli for 2-3 minutes. Season with oyster sauce. 10. Add salt and curry powder to taste.
prediction:
Title: Singaporean Fried Rice Noodles

Ingredients:
- 3 rolls of Singaporean rice noodles (specifically for stir-frying)
- 15-20 fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1/2 large onion, thinly sliced
- 1 small carrot, julienned
- 3-5 green bell peppers, thinly sliced
- 1 large sausage (ham or similar), thinly sliced
- Minced garlic, sliced green onions, and dried red chili peppers, to taste
- Curry powder, to taste
- Salt, to taste
- Cooking oil, as needed
- Oyster sauce, to taste

Instructions:
1. Soak the rice noodles in cold water for 10-15 minutes, then drain well. Set aside.
2. Heat a small amount of oil in a large pan or wok over low heat. Add the sliced green onions, minced garlic, and dried red chili peppers. Stir-fry until fragrant.
3. Add the shrimp to the pan and cook until they turn pink.
4. Add the sliced onion, julienned carrot, and sliced green bell peppers to the pan. Stir-fry for a few minutes until the vegetables begin to soften.
5. Add the sliced sausage, a pinch of salt, and a small amount of curry powder to the pan. Stir well to combine. If needed, add a little hot water to help cook the vegetables.
6. Once the vegetables are mostly cooked, add the soaked and drained rice noodles to the pan. Stir-fry together, adding oil around the edges of the pan to prevent sticking.
7. Cook the noodles for 2-3 minutes, then begin seasoning. Add oyster sauce and salt to taste.
8. Finish by adding a generous amount of curry powder, stirring well to combine.
9. Serve the Singaporean Fried Rice Noodles hot and enjoy the delicious golden dish!

source: Title: 扬州炒饭, Ingredients: 半根胡萝卜 两个鸡蛋 半根黄瓜 小半个紫皮圆葱 半根秋林红肠, Steps: 紫皮圆葱、黄瓜、红肠切小丁，胡萝卜切沫，备用 鸡蛋打散，用筷子高速搅打几下至出沫，下油锅炒散，盛出来，备用。炒的时候趁蛋液未凝固快速翻动锅铲，这样炒出来的蛋比较散。 起锅另放油，放入圆葱小火煸至圆葱酥黄，葱香四溢，加入胡萝卜和黄瓜丁翻炒，炒至黄瓜变色呈透明状，即可加入米饭。 待米饭炒匀，加入红肠和炒好的鸡蛋，翻炒几下，加盐调味即可出锅。小馋孩一口气吃了满满两碗，彻底打乱了我让他减肥的计划
references: Title: egg fried rice, Ingredients: half a carrot 2 eggs half a cucumber half small red onion half a sausage cooked rice, Steps: Finely dice onion, cucumber, and sausage. Mince carrot. Whisk egg, then stirfry in a pan until cooked. Remove from pan. Add oil to the pan and cook onion until fragrant, then add carrots and cucumber until cucumber turns transparent. Add rice and stir fry until evenly distributed, then add sausage and eggs. Add salt to taste and serve
prediction:
Title: Yangzhou Fried Rice

Ingredients:
- 1/2 carrot
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 cucumber
- 1/2 small red onion
- 1/2 sausage (preferably Chinese sausage)

Instructions:
1. Dice the red onion, cucumber, and sausage. Finely chop the carrot and set aside.
2. In a bowl, beat the eggs until frothy using chopsticks or a fork. Heat some oil in a wok or large frying pan over medium heat. Pour in the beaten eggs and quickly scramble them until cooked but still soft. Remove the eggs from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add a little more oil and cook the diced red onion over low heat until it becomes soft and golden, releasing its aroma.
4. Add the chopped carrot and diced cucumber to the pan, and stir-fry until the cucumber becomes translucent.
5. Add cooked rice to the pan and mix well with the vegetables.
6. Add the diced sausage and cooked eggs to the pan, and stir-fry for a few more minutes.
7. Season with salt to taste, and serve immediately. Enjoy your delicious Yangzhou Fried Rice!

source: Title: 鸡丝凉面, Ingredients: 1只鸡腿 1条黄瓜 3两鲜手工面 适量辣椒油 适量麻酱 适量姜蒜泥 少许糖 适量酱油 适量醋 少许花椒油 少许葱花 适量葱段 适量生姜 少许料酒 少许八角 适量油, Steps: 鸡腿退冰洗净，在冷锅中放入少许料酒，八角、生姜、葱段，加适量水，大火烧开后转中小火炖煮20分钟后将鸡腿捞出，放凉后手撕成鸡丝备用。 黄瓜切丝。 煮面条：在锅中加入少许盐，水沸后将面条下入，煮至9分熟沥水捞起，过凉水可饮用的纯净水，加入适量的油将面条拌匀，用风扇吹凉会摊开晾凉。 调味：底部码上黄瓜丝，放入适量面条和鸡丝，辣椒油视个人吃辣程度添加，淋上少许麻酱，加入适量姜蒜泥、酱油、醋，少许糖和香油，搅拌均匀即可食用。
references: Title: Cold noodles with shredded chicken, Ingredients: 1. 1 chicken leg 2. 1 cucumber, julienned 3. 150 g ramen noodles  4. 1 tbsp vegetable oil  5. 1 tsp chilli flakes (or according to one's preference) 6. 1 tsp sesame paste 7. 1 tsp sliced ginger and 1 tsp grated ginger 8 1 tsp grated garlic 9. 1 tsp sugar 10. 1 tbsp soy sauce 11. 1 tbsp vinegar 12. 1 spring onion, chopped 13. 1 tbsp mirin 14. Salt and pepper (to taste) , Steps: 1. Wash the chicken leg and add to a pot. 2. Add the cooking wine, sliced ginger, spring onion into the pot, add 500 ml water, cook on high heat until the water is boiling.  3. Lower the heat, cook for 20 minutes and set the chicken leg aside. 4. When the chicken leg is cooled, shred it. 5. To cook the noodles: fill another pot with water, add salt and cook on high heat. When the water is boiling, add noddles. When almost cooked, remove the noodles and rinse under cold water. Add oil and mix well. 6. For the sauce: add cucumber to a bowl, add noodles, shredded chicken, oil, chilli flakes, grated ginger, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar and sugar. Mix well and serve.
prediction:
Title: Shredded Chicken Cold Noodles

Ingredients:
- 1 chicken leg
- 1 cucumber
- 10.5 oz fresh noodles
- Chili oil, to taste
- Sesame paste, to taste
- Ginger and garlic paste, to taste
- A pinch of sugar
- Soy sauce, to taste
- Vinegar, to taste
- A pinch of Sichuan peppercorn oil
- A pinch of chopped green onions
- Green onion sections, to taste
- Fresh ginger, to taste
- A pinch of cooking wine
- A pinch of star anise
- Cooking oil, to taste

Instructions:

1. Defrost and clean the chicken leg. In a cold pot, add a pinch of cooking wine, star anise, fresh ginger, and green onion sections. Add enough water to cover the chicken leg. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce to medium-low heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove the chicken leg from the pot, let it cool, and shred it by hand. Set aside.

2. Julienne the cucumber.

3. Cook the noodles: In a pot, add a pinch of salt and bring water to a boil. Add the noodles and cook until al dente. Drain the noodles and rinse them under cold water. Add some cooking oil to the noodles and mix well. Spread the noodles out and let them cool with the help of a fan.

4. Assemble the dish: Place the cucumber shreds at the bottom of a serving plate. Add the cooked noodles and shredded chicken on top. Add chili oil according to your desired spiciness level. Drizzle with a bit of sesame paste. Add ginger and garlic paste, soy sauce, vinegar, a pinch of sugar, and Sichuan peppercorn oil to taste. Mix everything well and enjoy your Shredded Chicken Cold Noodles!

source: Title: 凉拌豆芽, Ingredients: 把豆芽 勺胡萝卜 粒菠菜 克盐 瓣醋 勺凉拌汁 根葱姜蒜 胡椒粉 香油, Steps: 1豆芽，红萝卜丝，菠菜，用开水过一下。捞出来放盆里。2蒜泥，姜沫，大葱放在上面，用热油浇一下。3一勺半盐，一勺凉拌汁，一勺醋，一勺芝麻香油，一勺胡椒粉。拌开即可。绿豆芽也是同样的。
references: Title: beansprout salad, Ingredients: beansprout carrot spinach salt vinegar garlic ginger pepper olive oil, Steps: Finely slice carrots. Blanch beansprouts, carrots, and spinach in boiling water briefly, then drain. Add minced garlic and sliced ginger on top, then add seasoning. Mix to combine.
prediction:
Title: Cold Mixed Bean Sprouts Salad

Ingredients:
- 200g bean sprouts
- 1 medium carrot, julienned
- 100g spinach leaves
- 1/2 tsp salt
- 1 tbsp vinegar
- 1 tbsp salad dressing (e.g., Italian dressing)
- 1 green onion, finely chopped
- 1 small piece of ginger, minced
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1/4 tsp black pepper
- 1 tbsp sesame oil

Instructions:
1. Blanch the bean sprouts, julienned carrots, and spinach leaves in boiling water for about 30 seconds. Remove from the water and place them in a large mixing bowl.
2. In a small pan, heat some vegetable oil. Add the minced garlic, ginger, and chopped green onion. Cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant. Pour the hot oil mixture over the blanched vegetables in the mixing bowl.
3. In a small bowl, combine the salt, salad dressing, vinegar, sesame oil, and black pepper. Mix well.
4. Pour the dressing mixture over the vegetables and toss to combine. Serve the salad cold. Enjoy your Cold Mixed Bean Sprouts Salad!

source: Title: 酸菜猪肉饺子, Ingredients: 克酸菜500 克五花肉500 毫升面粉750 根葱半根 适量姜 适量盐 适量生抽, Steps: 猪肉馅是自己绞的，肥肉和瘦肉大概5比4，因酸菜油大会更好吃一些，特增加了一些荤油。 酸菜是买袋装的，里面是已经切好的酸菜丝，自己再剁比较容易。葱姜切末，荤油起锅，放入葱姜末炒出香味关火，待锅凉一些放入猪肉馅搅拌均匀，再把酸菜末挤出多余水分和肉馅搅拌，放入适量的盐和生抽调味。 面粉我买的是高筋面粉，对和面技术不好的朋友高筋面粉可是避免煮饺子时变成片汤的尴尬，我自己经验，每次可以多包一些放入饺子盒冰箱冷冻。 热气腾腾的酸菜猪肉馅饺子出锅啦
references: Title: pork and sauerkraut dumplings, Ingredients: 500 g sauerkraut 500 g minced pork 750 g bread flour half onion salt , Steps: finely chop sauerkraut and onion, then mix with minced pork. Add salt to taste. Make a dough from flour and water, or purchase premade dumpling or wonton wrappers. Make dumplings with filling  and boil until cooked.
prediction:
Title: Sour Cabbage and Pork Dumplings

Ingredients:
- 500g sour cabbage
- 500g pork belly
- 750ml all-purpose flour
- 1/2 green onion
- Ginger, to taste
- Salt, to taste
- Soy sauce, to taste

Instructions:
1. Prepare the pork filling by grinding the pork belly. Aim for a ratio of about 5:4 between fatty and lean meat, as the extra fat will make the dumplings more flavorful.
2. Use pre-packaged, shredded sour cabbage for convenience. Chop it further if needed.
3. Finely chop the green onion and ginger. Heat some oil in a pan and sauté the green onion and ginger until fragrant. Remove from heat and let the pan cool slightly.
4. Mix the sautéed green onion and ginger with the ground pork, ensuring an even distribution. Squeeze out any excess water from the chopped sour cabbage and mix it into the pork filling. Season with salt and soy sauce to taste.
5. Use all-purpose flour for the dumpling dough. If you're not confident in your dough-making skills, using all-purpose flour can help prevent the dumplings from falling apart during cooking. You can also make extra dumplings and store them in a freezer-safe container in the freezer.
6. Cook the dumplings in boiling water until they float to the surface and are cooked through. Serve the steaming hot sour cabbage and pork dumplings immediately.

source: Title: 简单盐焗鸡, Ingredients: 适量姜 一包盐焗鸡粉 半只鸡 适量蒜, Steps: 买三黄鸡半只，洗净 抹上盐焗鸡粉，腌制10-30分钟，而我腌的比较久，腌了一个下午 电饭锅放入蒜和姜，我家里的电饭锅总是会焗得蒜和姜都糊了，不知道别家会不会糊 把腌制好的鸡放电饭锅里，按下煮饭键就好了，我的是煮一次后翻身再煮一次，避免鸡肉不熟 美味的盐焗鸡就做好了，虽然颜值不怎么样，味道还是不错的
references: Title: simple salt baked chicken, Ingredients: whole chicken half head of garlic 1 onion salt, Steps: Rub the outside of the chicken with salt and leave to marinate for 10-30 minutes. Chop garlic and onion and stick them inside the chicken. Roast in a 200 C oven for 45-60 minutes or until juices run clear when pierced with a knife.
prediction:
Title: Simple Salt-Baked Chicken

Ingredients:
- A handful of ginger
- 1 packet of salt-baked chicken seasoning
- 1/2 chicken
- A handful of garlic

Instructions:
1. Purchase a half chicken (preferably free-range), and clean it thoroughly.
2. Rub the salt-baked chicken seasoning all over the chicken, and let it marinate for 10-30 minutes. For a more intense flavor, marinate for a longer period, such as an entire afternoon.
3. Place the garlic and ginger in a rice cooker. Note that some rice cookers may cause the garlic and ginger to burn, so keep an eye on them.
4. Place the marinated chicken in the rice cooker and press the "cook" button. Depending on your rice cooker, you may need to flip the chicken and cook it a second time to ensure it is fully cooked.
5. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the rice cooker. Although the presentation may not be perfect, the delicious salt-baked chicken is ready to be enjoyed!

source: Title: 老虎菜, Ingredients: 适量青辣椒 适量香菜 适量葱 适量醋 适量盐 适量香油 适量生抽, Steps: 辣椒和香菜洗净 剁成丁 洒入盐，醋，生抽，香油调味
references: Title: Chinese Tiger Salad, Ingredients: Salad: 1. 1 green chili pepper 2. 1 cup cilantro , thick stems removed 3. 2 green onions Dressing: 1. 1 1/2 tablespoons rice vinegar 2. 1/2 teaspoon salt 3. 1 1/2 teaspoons sesame oil 4. 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce, Steps: 1.  Thinly slice the chili pepper and the green onions in a diagonal. Chopped the cilantro into 1”(2.5 cm) pieces. 2. Combine the vegetables in a large bowl. 3. Season with vinegar, salt, soy sauce and sesame oil.
prediction:
Title: Tiger Salad

Ingredients:
- A handful of green chili peppers (adjust to taste)
- A bunch of fresh cilantro
- 2-3 green onions
- 2 tablespoons of vinegar (adjust to taste)
- Salt to taste
- 1 tablespoon of sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon of soy sauce

Instructions:
1. Rinse the green chili peppers and cilantro under cold water. Pat dry with a paper towel.
2. Finely chop the green chili peppers, cilantro, and green onions.
3. In a mixing bowl, combine the chopped ingredients.
4. Add salt, vinegar, soy sauce, and sesame oil to the bowl. Toss the salad to mix well and ensure the ingredients are evenly coated.
5. Taste and adjust the seasoning if necessary.
6. Serve immediately as a side dish or appetizer. Enjoy!

source: Title: 椒盐虾, Ingredients: 1斤虾 10克椒盐 5克盐 5克胡椒粉 1勺五香粉 100克生粉 50克面粉, Steps: 面粉和生粉加水混合在一起搅拌，加入盐和胡椒粉五香粉一起搅拌均匀。 倒入洗净的虾，裹上浆糊。 热油炸起来，先炸一部分。 炸好再全部倒入锅中一起复炸一次捞起。 又脆又香还可以当零食吃哦 一蒸一炸的海鲜餐不用半个小时就搞定。
references: Title: salt and pepper shrimp, Ingredients: 1 kg shrimp 10 g black pepper 5 g salt 100 g cornstarch 50 g flour, Steps: Mix cornstarch and flour with water to make a batter, then add salt and pepper. Cover cleaned shrimp in batter Fry in batches
prediction:
Title: Salt and Pepper Shrimp

Ingredients:
- 1 lb shrimp
- 10g salt and pepper mix
- 5g salt
- 5g ground black pepper
- 1 tsp five-spice powder
- 100g cornstarch
- 50g all-purpose flour
- Water, as needed
- Oil, for frying

Instructions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the all-purpose flour and cornstarch. Gradually add water while stirring until a smooth batter is formed. Add salt, ground black pepper, and five-spice powder to the batter and mix well.

2. Clean the shrimp and pat them dry. Add the shrimp to the batter, making sure each shrimp is well-coated.

3. Heat oil in a deep frying pan or deep fryer over medium-high heat. Fry the shrimp in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan. Cook each batch until the shrimp are golden and crispy, about 2-3 minutes per side.

4. Once all the shrimp have been fried, return them to the hot oil for a second frying to ensure extra crispiness. Fry for an additional 1-2 minutes, then remove the shrimp from the oil and drain on paper towels.

5. In a small bowl, mix together the salt and pepper mix. Sprinkle the mixture over the fried shrimp and toss to coat evenly.

6. Serve the salt and pepper shrimp as an appetizer or snack, or as part of a seafood meal. Enjoy!

source: Title: 拍黄瓜, Ingredients: 2根黄瓜 30克生抽 30克醋 15克糖 15克盐 5克辣椒油 5克花椒油 几瓣蒜, Steps: 先把黄瓜洗净，放在案板上。 准备一把菜刀，重重的从头到尾这样拍下去，来回拍两遍，你看黄瓜就已经裂开啦。 然后再切成容易入口的小块。既然叫拍黄瓜，就一定要这样用拍的，而不能是切的，拍了之后才容易拌入味。 接着来捣蒜，做凉菜是一定少不了蒜的，否则你肯定做不出来饭店那种味道的。把几瓣蒜放到蒜臼里，捣成蒜泥。我用的这个是大理石的，够重才好用。 再来调汁，生抽2大勺约30克，醋2大勺约30克，糖1大勺约15克，盐适量，辣椒油1小勺约5克，花椒油1勺约5克，再把捣好的蒜泥放进去，拌匀。关于拌黄瓜的料，其实你有什么都可以放进去，真的可以很随意的，不要拘泥吖。 把黄瓜和料汁倒在一起，拌匀，然后放到冰箱里冷藏20分钟再吃，味道刚刚好呀。 你做好了之后记得拍照给我，在微博上小羽私厨的桐小羽，我会选出棒棒的作品赠送小礼物呀。
references: Title: Smashed cucumber sald, Ingredients: 2 cucumbers 30 g soy sauce 30 g rice vinegar (balsamic okay) 15 g sugar 15 g salt 5 g chili oil 5 g sichuan pepper oil (optional) several garlic cloves, Steps: Wash the cucumber, then smash it on a chopping board with the flat side of a cleaver Chop the smashed cucumber into small pieces Smash garlic in a mortar and pestle until pureed Make the salad dressing by mixing approximately 30 g soy sauce, 30 g vinegar, 15 g sugar, 5 g chili oil, 5 g sichuan pepper oil, and salt to taste. Add smashed garlic.  Combine dressing with cucumber and refrigerate for 20 minutes for the flavours to meld together.
prediction:
Title: Smashed Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cucumbers
- 30g soy sauce
- 30g vinegar
- 15g sugar
- 15g salt
- 5g chili oil
- 5g Sichuan peppercorn oil
- A few cloves of garlic

Instructions:
1. Wash the cucumbers and place them on a cutting board.
2. Using the flat side of a chef's knife, firmly smash the cucumbers from one end to the other, going back and forth twice. This will cause the cucumbers to split open.
3. Cut the smashed cucumbers into bite-sized pieces. Smashing the cucumbers, rather than just cutting them, allows the flavors to be absorbed more easily.
4. Crush the garlic cloves using a mortar and pestle or a garlic press to create a garlic paste.
5. In a mixing bowl, combine the soy sauce (30g), vinegar (30g), sugar (15g), salt (to taste), chili oil (5g), Sichuan peppercorn oil (5g), and the crushed garlic paste. Mix well. Feel free to add any other ingredients you like to the sauce, as this recipe is quite versatile.
6. Combine the cucumber pieces with the sauce, ensuring they are well-coated. Place the mixture in the refrigerator to chill for 20 minutes before serving. This will allow the flavors to meld together perfectly.

Enjoy your Smashed Cucumber Salad, and don't forget to share your creation on social media!

source: Title: 土豆炖牛肉, Ingredients: 土豆、牛腩、花椒、大料、香叶、盐、酱油、葱、姜, Steps: 牛腩切小块在沸水中焯去血沫，另起一锅烧热适量油，油温7成热时加入切好的葱姜片爆香，然后加入焯好的牛肉块大火快炒一下，同时加入酱油和料酒比例为21，接着加入些许热水，没过牛肉即可，最后将炒锅里的牛肉和汤汁一起倒入压力锅，再加入切好的土豆块，焖煮1小时就好啦。 我用的是电压力锅，所以时间需要长一些，普通压力锅应该最多40分钟就ok了。如果没有压力锅，要用普通锅煮1个半小时。。。单机的土豆要在最后的25分钟加。
references: Title: Beef and potato stew, Ingredients: potato beef brisket oil pepper salt garlic onion red wine beef stock, Steps: Chop the beef into small pieces. Cook in a pan with oil to sear the outside.  Remove the beef from the pan and cook onion and garlic in oil until fragrant. Add beef back in, plus enough red wine and beef stock until the meat is covered. Add roughly diced potatoes. Cook covered on the stove for 1 hour until cooked through. Alternatively the pan can be covered and cooked in the oven, or cooked in the pressure cooker.
prediction:
Title: Potato and Beef Stew

Ingredients:
- 2 large potatoes
- 1 lb beef brisket
- 1 tsp Sichuan peppercorns
- 2 star anise
- 2 bay leaves
- Salt, to taste
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 2 green onions
- 1-inch piece of ginger
- 2 tbsp vegetable oil
- 1 tbsp Chinese cooking wine (Shaoxing wine)

Instructions:
1. Cut the beef brisket into small cubes. Blanch the beef in boiling water to remove any impurities and blood. Drain and set aside.
2. In a separate pot, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. When the oil is hot (about 70% heated), add the sliced green onions and ginger. Stir-fry until fragrant.
3. Add the blanched beef cubes to the pot and stir-fry over high heat. Add the soy sauce and Chinese cooking wine in a 2:1 ratio.
4. Pour in enough hot water to cover the beef. Add the Sichuan peppercorns, star anise, and bay leaves. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer.
5. Transfer the beef and sauce to a pressure cooker. Peel and cut the potatoes into cubes, then add them to the pressure cooker.
6. Cook the stew in the pressure cooker for 1 hour. If using an electric pressure cooker, the cooking time may be longer. If using a regular pressure cooker, the cooking time should be around 40 minutes. If you don't have a pressure cooker, cook the stew in a regular pot for 1.5 hours, adding the potatoes during the last 25 minutes of cooking.
7. Season with salt to taste and serve hot. Enjoy your Potato and Beef Stew!

source: Title: 红豆汤, Ingredients: 适量红豆 适量米酒 适量带皮老姜, Steps: 姜切成丝，和红豆放入米酒中，搅匀浸泡8小时 浸泡好的红豆放入锅内，大火煮沸，搅拌一下，调成小火熬制30分钟。
references: Title: Sweet Red Bean Soup, Ingredients: 1. 2 cups dried adzuki beans 2. 1/2 cup sugar 3. 1 inch fresh ginger, Steps: 1. Soak the beans in water for 8 hours. 2. Drain the beans and put in a medium-sized pot. 3. Peel and julienne the ginger, and add it to the pot. 4. Add 6 cups of water. Bring to a boil over high heat, stir, lower the heat and let simmer for 30 minutes.
prediction:
Title: Red Bean Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 cup red beans (adzuki beans)
- 1/4 cup rice wine (or substitute with dry sherry)
- 1-inch piece of fresh ginger, with skin

Instructions:
1. Rinse the red beans and place them in a bowl. Thinly slice the ginger and add it to the bowl with the beans.
2. Pour the rice wine over the beans and ginger, ensuring they are fully submerged. Stir to combine, then cover and let soak for 8 hours or overnight.
3. After soaking, transfer the beans, ginger, and soaking liquid to a large pot. Bring the mixture to a boil over high heat, stirring occasionally.
4. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and let the soup simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
5. Taste the soup and adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve hot and enjoy your Red Bean Soup!

source: Title: 回锅肉, Ingredients: 12块左右的肉五花肉 1只青椒 2勺郫县豆瓣酱 适量姜片 适量料酒 1勺糖 8粒左右花椒 少量鸡精, Steps: 选用肥瘦相间的五花肉，冷水冲干净后，锅里放水，加几片姜片、花椒、料酒与五花肉同煮，水烧开后再煮一会，用筷子戳一下没有血水就可以关火了，不用熟透的，待会还要烧了。 把煮过的五花肉取出用冷水冲干净沥干，用刀切成大小均匀的肉片待用。青椒切三角片待用。 锅烧热放底油，改小火，放入肉片用铲子划散。 加入料酒，煎到肉微微泛黄。 加入郫县豆瓣酱，改中火翻炒一下，再加入青椒片和一勺糖，翻炒一下。 青椒断生后关火，加入少量鸡精翻炒一下。鸡精不加也不要紧 出锅装盘，享用美食。
references: Title: Sichuan-style twice cooked pork, Ingredients: 1. 400g pork belly 2. 1 green bell pepper 3.  2 tsp chili sauce 4. ½ thumb ginger, sliced 5. 2 tbsp cooking wine 6. 1 tsp sugar 7. 8 Sichuan peppercorns, or black peppercorn, Steps: 1. Rinse the pork belly in cold water. Fill a pot with water, add ginger, peppercorns, 1 tbsp of the cooking wine and pork belly. Bring to a boil and simmer for 25-30 minutes. 2. Remove pork belly from the pot, and rinse under cold water, drain, and cut into 1-2mm slices. Set aside. Slice the pepper and set aside. 3. Heat the oil in a wok, lower the heat and arrange the meat slices evenly. 4. Add 1 tbsp of the cooking wine. Fry the meat until slightly browned. 5. Add chili sauce and fry on medium heat. Add sliced green pepper and sugar. Stir well. 6. When the green pepper is cooked, turn off the heat. 7. Serve and enjoy.
prediction:
Title: Twice-Cooked Pork

Ingredients:
- 12 slices of pork belly
- 1 green bell pepper
- 2 tablespoons Pixian bean paste
- A few slices of ginger
- Cooking wine, to taste
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 8 Sichuan peppercorns
- A pinch of chicken bouillon powder (optional)

Instructions:
1. Choose pork belly with alternating layers of fat and lean meat. Rinse the pork belly with cold water. In a pot, add water, a few slices of ginger, Sichuan peppercorns, and cooking wine. Add the pork belly and bring to a boil. Once boiling, cook for a few more minutes until there is no blood when poked with chopsticks. Do not cook the pork completely, as it will be cooked further later. Remove the pork from the pot and rinse with cold water. Drain and set aside.

2. Slice the cooked pork belly into even pieces. Cut the green bell pepper into triangular pieces and set aside.

3. Heat a wok or large frying pan over medium heat and add some oil. Reduce the heat to low and add the sliced pork belly, separating the pieces with a spatula.

4. Add cooking wine and cook until the pork turns slightly golden.

5. Add the Pixian bean paste and increase the heat to medium. Stir-fry for a moment, then add the green bell pepper pieces and sugar. Continue to stir-fry.

6. Once the green bell pepper is cooked but still crisp, turn off the heat. Add a pinch of chicken bouillon powder (optional) and stir-fry for a moment.

7. Transfer the dish to a serving plate and enjoy your delicious Twice-Cooked Pork.

source: Title: 鱼香茄子, Ingredients: 1个茄子 蒜 葱 姜 1克盐 2勺糖 3勺醋 1勺豆瓣酱 2勺生抽 1勺老抽 1勺料酒 1勺淀粉, Steps: 干筷子放入油中有小气泡冒出差不多为四五成热 茄子切段，沾淀粉五成油温炸至表面金黄 豆瓣酱小火煸出红油 葱姜蒜末爆香，烹入料酒去酱料腥味 碗汁：盐1克、糖两勺满、生抽两勺、老抽一勺、醋三勺、淀粉一勺，拌匀收汁，碗中勺大小，豆瓣酱有咸味，其他有盐分要少些根据个人家中酱油盐咸度添加 将炸制好的茄子裹匀料汁出锅装盘
references: Title: Chinese-Style Deep Fried Eggplant, Ingredients: 1. 1 eggplant 2. 1 clove garlic 3. 2 scallion 4. 1 inch ginger 5. 1/2 tsp salt 6. 2 tsp sugar 7. 3 tsp vinegar 8. 1 tsp chili sauce 9. 3 tsp soy sauce 10. 1 tsp cooking wine 11. 1 cup and 1 tsp white flour 12. oil for deep frying, Steps: 1. Fill a small saucepan with oil and heat to 365°F; ensure the oil is hot enough by using a thermometer. 2. Put 1 cup flour in a bowl. Cut eggplant to thick strips, cover with flour and fry on medium heat until golden. 3. Move the eggplant to a separate pan on medium heat. 4. Add chili sauce to and lower the heat. 5. Add ginger, scallion and garlic. Sauté until fragrant. Add cooking wine and cook until the wine is reduced. 6. Mix 1/2 tsp salt, 2 tsp sugar, 3 tsp soy sauce, 3 tsp vinegar, 1 tsp flour in a bowl. Adjust salt to taste since soy sauce is also salty. 7. Lay the fried eggplant in the sauce and serve on a plate.
prediction:
Title: Fish-Flavored Eggplant

Ingredients:
- 1 eggplant
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 green onion, chopped
- 1 small piece of ginger, minced
- 1 gram of salt
- 2 tablespoons of sugar
- 3 tablespoons of vinegar
- 1 tablespoon of doubanjiang (spicy bean paste)
- 2 tablespoons of light soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon of dark soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon of Chinese cooking wine (Shaoxing wine)
- 1 tablespoon of cornstarch

Instructions:
1. Heat oil in a deep frying pan or wok over medium heat. Test the oil temperature by inserting a dry chopstick into the oil; if small bubbles form around the chopstick, the oil is about 350°F (175°C) and ready for frying.
2. Cut the eggplant into bite-sized pieces and coat them with cornstarch.
3. Fry the eggplant pieces in the heated oil until the surface turns golden brown. Remove from the oil and set aside on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.
4. In a separate pan, heat a small amount of oil over low heat and add the doubanjiang. Cook until the oil turns red.
5. Add the minced garlic, chopped green onion, and minced ginger to the pan. Stir-fry until fragrant.
6. Pour in the Chinese cooking wine to remove any strong flavors from the sauce ingredients.
7. In a small bowl, mix together the salt, sugar, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, vinegar, and cornstarch to create the sauce.
8. Adjust the saltiness of the sauce according to your personal taste and the saltiness of the doubanjiang and soy sauce used.
9. Add the fried eggplant to the pan with the sauce and stir to coat the eggplant evenly.
10. Transfer the eggplant to a serving plate and enjoy!

source: Title: 酱油炒饭, Ingredients: 熟米饭 海鲜酱油, Steps: 准备一大碗米饭，可以是剩饭，也可以现煮米饭，要煮的硬一点，放冷也可以放冰箱 锅里放沙拉油，放入米饭翻炒几下就放海鲜酱油，小火翻炒到上色均匀 可以适当的放喜欢的蔬菜。当然不放也很好吃
references: Title: Fried rice with soy sauce, Ingredients: 1. 1 c white rice, cooked and chilled 2. 2 tbsp soy sauce 3. 1 tbsp vegetable oil 4. Optional: chopped vegetables of your choosing, Steps: 1. Add the oil to a pot, add the rice and stir well, add the soy sauce, cook on low heat and stir until combined. 2. Add the vegetables if you like. It's also delicious without vegetables.
prediction:
Title: Soy Sauce Fried Rice

Ingredients:
- Cooked rice (preferably slightly firm and cooled, leftover rice works well)
- Seafood soy sauce
- Salad oil (or any neutral-flavored cooking oil)
- Optional: vegetables of your choice

Instructions:
1. Prepare a large bowl of cooked rice. It can be leftover rice or freshly cooked rice, but make sure it's slightly firm. Allow the rice to cool down or store it in the refrigerator for a while.
2. Heat a pan or wok over medium heat and add salad oil (or any neutral-flavored cooking oil).
3. Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir-fry for a few moments.
4. Pour in the seafood soy sauce and reduce the heat to low. Continue to stir-fry until the rice is evenly coated and has taken on the color of the sauce.
5. If desired, add your favorite vegetables to the fried rice. You can also enjoy the dish without any vegetables, as it will still be delicious.

source: Title: 手擀面, Ingredients: 400克面粉 适量水 01克盐 一小把韭菜 两个鸡蛋 两勺或一勺生抽 适量酱油 各一勺味精鸡精 一勺香油, Steps: 400克面粉加 1克盐 放入适量的水，和成面团 在菜刀板上撒上面粉，防止它粘上去，擀面杖最好用大的，把它擀得比菜刀板还要大。 擀成菜刀板那样大的时候，把它叠成如图的长方形块块，用菜刀把它切成细条条 切成这样 切好之后，把它用手翻一翻，弄散就行，放到盘子或锅架上 把韭菜切碎，放入味精，鸡精，盐，酱油，生抽，香油 鸡蛋打碎放到锅里搅搅，捞出放入调料碗里，卤子就做好了 烧水下面 浇上卤子，这样就大功告成了
references: Title: hand-cut noodle soup, Ingredients: 400 g flour water 1 g salt 1 small bunch chives 2 eggs 2 tablespoon soy sauce 1 teaspoon oilve oil , Steps: Combine flour and salt with enough water to form a dough Roll out the dough to a thin sheet, then fold and slice to form hand-cut noodles Finely chop chives, put in a bowl with soy sauce and oil Whisk eggs and cook in a pan, then take out and combine with seasoning in the bowl Boil water and cook noodles  To serve, drain noodles and put in a bowl, add seasoning.
prediction:
Title: Hand-Rolled Noodles with Chive and Egg Sauce

Ingredients:
- 400g all-purpose flour
- Water, as needed
- 1g salt
- A small bunch of chives
- 2 eggs
- 1-2 tablespoons light soy sauce
- Soy sauce, to taste
- 1 tablespoon MSG (optional)
- 1 tablespoon chicken bouillon powder (optional)
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil

Instructions:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 400g of all-purpose flour and 1g of salt. Gradually add water while mixing until a dough forms. Knead the dough until smooth.

2. Lightly dust a cutting board with flour to prevent sticking. Using a large rolling pin, roll out the dough until it is larger than the cutting board.

3. Fold the dough into a rectangular shape, as shown in the picture. Using a sharp knife, cut the dough into thin strips.

4. After cutting the dough, separate the noodles by hand and place them on a plate or wire rack.

5. Finely chop the chives and place them in a mixing bowl. Add MSG, chicken bouillon powder, salt, soy sauce, light soy sauce, and sesame oil. Mix well.

6. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs. Pour the beaten eggs into a pan and scramble them. Once cooked, transfer the scrambled eggs to the mixing bowl with the chive mixture. Stir to combine, creating the sauce.

7. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook the noodles in the boiling water until they reach your desired level of doneness.

8. Drain the noodles and place them in a serving dish. Pour the chive and egg sauce over the noodles, and mix well. Enjoy your hand-rolled noodles with chive and egg sauce!

source: Title: 小米粥, Ingredients: 小米 清水, Steps: 锅里水烧开 接着倒入洗好的小米 大火烧开后小火慢炖 小火慢慢直至煮至小米粥浓稠即可。 一碗营养美味的小米粥出锅了
references: Title: Millet porridge, Ingredients: 1. 1/3 cup millet, washed and drained 2. 3/4 cup water, Steps: 1. Boil water in a small saucepan on high heat. 2. Add the millet to the saucepan. 3. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer until thick. 4. Serve.
prediction:
Title: Millet Porridge

Ingredients:
- 1 cup millet
- 4 cups water

Instructions:
1. Rinse the millet thoroughly under cold water.
2. In a medium-sized pot, bring the water to a boil.
3. Add the rinsed millet to the boiling water.
4. Once the water returns to a boil, reduce the heat to low and let the porridge simmer.
5. Continue to cook on low heat, stirring occasionally, until the millet porridge reaches a thick and creamy consistency.
6. Remove the pot from the heat and let the porridge cool for a few minutes.
7. Serve the nutritious and delicious millet porridge in a bowl and enjoy!

source: Title: 脆皮日本豆腐, Ingredients: 3条日本豆腐 30克洋葱 2个香菇 20克胡萝卜 2瓣蒜 一碗淀粉 15克生抽 8克耗油 6克白糖 1克盐 1克鸡精 50克水淀粉, Steps: 干香菇泡发，嫌麻烦的用新鲜的就好。 日本豆腐连包装中间切一刀，去掉外包装，在均匀切块。动作温柔点。 豆腐均匀的裹上淀粉。 锅里放油，七成热的时候放入豆腐块，仍然是温柔点，每个豆腐间大一点，粘连就废了 炸好的豆腐，豆腐要多炸一会，表皮脆脆的内里仍然软软的， 配菜：洋葱，胡萝卜，香菇通通切丁，锅烧热倒油，一起扔进去。 配菜炒熟后放入豆腐，如果炸的好，其实是不怕翻的。稍微温柔点就可以。 倒入所有料汁生抽，耗油，盐，糖，鸡精 最后水淀粉勾芡，关火。水要多一些，有汤汁才好吃。 开动吧
references: Title: Crispy tofu and vegetable stirfry, Ingredients: 1 pack soft tofu 30 g onion 2 mushrooms 20 g carrots 2 cloves garlic cornstarch 15 g soy sauce 8 g oyster sauce 6 g sugar 1 g salt 1 g bouillon, Steps: Gently slice tofu into large cubes, then evenly cover with cornstarch. Deep fry tofu pieces in oil making sure to leave plenty of space between them Dice onion, carrots, and mushrooms, then stir-fry in hot oil until cooked through. Add fried tofu pieces, then soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, salt, and bouillon. Thicken the sauce with starch if desired.
prediction:
Title: Crispy Japanese Tofu

Ingredients:
- 3 blocks of Japanese tofu
- 1/4 cup diced onion
- 2 shiitake mushrooms (dried or fresh)
- 1/4 cup diced carrot
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 cup cornstarch (for coating)
- 1 tablespoon soy sauce
- 1/2 tablespoon oyster sauce
- 1/2 tablespoon sugar
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon chicken bouillon powder
- 1/4 cup cornstarch mixed with 1/4 cup water (for thickening)

Instructions:
1. If using dried shiitake mushrooms, soak them in warm water until softened. If using fresh mushrooms, skip this step.
2. Cut the Japanese tofu in half, remove the packaging, and gently cut into even-sized pieces.
3. Coat the tofu pieces evenly with cornstarch.
4. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. When the oil is hot, gently place the tofu pieces in the pan, making sure to leave some space between them to prevent sticking. Fry until the tofu is crispy on the outside and soft on the inside.
5. Prepare the vegetables: dice the onion, carrot, and mushrooms. Heat some oil in a separate pan and add the vegetables and minced garlic. Stir-fry until cooked.
6. Add the fried tofu to the pan with the vegetables. Gently mix to combine.
7. Add the soy sauce, oyster sauce, salt, sugar, and chicken bouillon powder to the pan. Stir gently to coat the tofu and vegetables evenly.
8. Finally, add the cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce. Turn off the heat. Make sure there is enough sauce to coat the tofu and vegetables.
9. Serve and enjoy your Crispy Japanese Tofu!

source: Title: 蜜汁排骨, Ingredients: cook100新蜜汁烤肉料 排骨, Steps: 放入蜜汁排骨调料cook100蜜汁烤肉料，与排骨混合，搅拌均匀，腌制1小时 烤盘铺上锡纸，将腌好的排骨摆放好 烤箱预热220度，中层，上下火35分钟
references: Title: BBQ ribs, Ingredients: BBQ sauce  Ribs, Steps: Marinate ribs in BBQ sauce for one hour Preheat oven to 220 C Place ribs on baking tray covered in foil, place in the middle rack and cook for 35 minutes until done.
prediction:
Title: Honey Glazed Spare Ribs

Ingredients:
- 1 pack of Cook100 Honey Glaze BBQ Sauce
- 2 lbs of spare ribs

Instructions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the spare ribs with the Cook100 Honey Glaze BBQ Sauce. Mix well to ensure the ribs are evenly coated. Marinate for 1 hour.
2. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
3. Line a baking tray with aluminum foil and arrange the marinated spare ribs on the tray.
4. Place the tray in the middle rack of the preheated oven and bake for 35 minutes, using both the top and bottom heating elements.
5. Remove the ribs from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your delicious Honey Glazed Spare Ribs!

source: Title: 春卷, Ingredients: 750克春卷皮 1000克荠菜 500克油 2个鸡蛋 适量鸡精 适量盐 750克猪肉, Steps: 荠菜洗干净，焯水。并与猪肉一起，依次放进调味料，鸡蛋，搅拌均匀 根据图片样折叠即可。 锅里倒入色拉油，将油温烧至5成热，放入包好的春卷，炸至两面金黄就可以啦
references: Title: Chinese Spring Rolls, Ingredients: 1. 375g spring roll wrappers 2. 500g fresh spinach, finely chopped 3. 250g vegetable oil 4. 1 egg 5. 1 1/2 tsp salt 6. 375g  finely shredded pork loin, Steps: 1. Mix the spinach with the pork. Add seasoning and egg. Stir well. 2. Fold the wrappers with the filling according to the picture. 3. Heat oil in a medium-sized pot over medium eat. Fry the spring rolls until golden on both sides.
prediction:
Title: Spring Rolls

Ingredients:
- 750g spring roll wrappers
- 1000g watercress
- 500g vegetable oil (for frying)
- 2 eggs
- Chicken bouillon powder, to taste
- Salt, to taste
- 750g ground pork

Instructions:
1. Clean the watercress thoroughly and blanch it in boiling water for a few seconds. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the blanched watercress, ground pork, chicken bouillon powder, salt, and eggs. Mix well.
3. Place a small amount of the filling mixture onto each spring roll wrapper and fold according to the package instructions or search for a folding tutorial online.
4. In a deep frying pan or wok, heat the vegetable oil to medium heat (about 350°F or 175°C). Carefully place the filled spring rolls into the hot oil and fry until both sides are golden brown.
5. Remove the spring rolls from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil. Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce.

source: Title: 湖南小炒肉, Ingredients: 五花肉 青尖椒 小米辣 姜、大蒜 老抽 油盐 蒜苗, Steps: 五花肉切薄片，青尖椒和蒜苗滚刀切，小米辣对半切，姜和蒜切片。 干净的锅烧热，直接下青尖椒到锅里烧出虎皮乘出。 下油烧热，放姜片蒜片和蒜苗炒出香味。然后拨到一边，下五花肉炒几下，合着姜蒜和蒜苗一起炒。放老抽上色。下青椒和小米辣翻炒，加盐，出锅
references: Title: spicy stir-fried pork with chile, Ingredients: pork belly jalepeno peppers ginger garlic soy sauce oil salt green onion or leek, Steps: thinly slice pork belly, cut peppers and green onion into  large pieces, slice ginger and garlic Broil or heat jalapeno pepper pieces over a gas flame until the skin starts to blister Add ginger, garlic, and green onion to a wok with some oil and stir-fry until fragrant. Remove and add sliced pork to the wok to stir fry briefly, then add ginger, garlic, and green onion back in. Add soy sauce for colour, then add jalepeno peppers  and stir-fry until cooked. Add salt for seasoning.
prediction:
Title: Hunan-Style Stir-Fried Pork

Ingredients:
- 1 lb pork belly, thinly sliced
- 2 green bell peppers, cut into thin strips
- 10 Thai bird's eye chilies, halved
- 1-inch piece of ginger, thinly sliced
- 4 cloves of garlic, thinly sliced
- 2 tablespoons dark soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- Salt, to taste
- 1/2 cup garlic scapes, chopped (optional)

Instructions:
1. Prepare the ingredients: Thinly slice the pork belly, cut the green bell peppers into thin strips, halve the Thai bird's eye chilies, and thinly slice the ginger and garlic. If using, chop the garlic scapes.

2. Heat a clean wok or large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the green bell pepper strips and cook until they develop a slightly charred appearance, about 2-3 minutes. Remove the peppers from the wok and set aside.

3. In the same wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the ginger, garlic, and garlic scapes (if using) and stir-fry until fragrant, about 1 minute.

4. Push the ginger and garlic mixture to one side of the wok, and add the sliced pork belly to the other side. Stir-fry the pork for 2-3 minutes, or until it starts to brown.

5. Combine the pork with the ginger and garlic mixture, and stir-fry everything together. Add the dark soy sauce to the wok, stirring to coat the pork evenly.

6. Add the cooked green bell peppers and Thai bird's eye chilies to the wok, and stir-fry everything together for another 1-2 minutes. Season with salt to taste.

7. Remove the stir-fry from the heat and transfer it to a serving dish. Enjoy your Hunan-Style Stir-Fried Pork with steamed rice or noodles.

source: Title: 鸡汤面, Ingredients: 适量鸡汤 适量面条 适量配菜木耳，春菜，蒜片，葱花, Steps: 原鸡汤少量加水，放入蒜片，加盐烧热，鸡胸肉撕成丝加入汤内。 另起一锅加水烧热，先放入青菜和木耳焯熟，取出备用。放入面条煮熟，我选用的是外面鲜面铺子里面当天做好的细面，挂面也是可以的。 把面捞出来，上面摆上青菜木耳，浇上汤汁，撒上葱花就好了。
references: Title: Chicken noodle soup, Ingredients: chicken broth cooked chicken breast noodles leafy vegetables mushrooms green onion or parsley, Steps: Heat broth in a pot with salt to taste. Shread chicken meat and all to the broth.  Boil water in a separate pot, first pre-cook the leafy vegetables and sliced mushrooms. Then remove the vegetables and cook noodles in the water.  To serve, put noodles in a bowl, add vegetables, then ladle soup on top. Add green onion or parsley as garnish
prediction:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup with Vegetables

Ingredients:
- Chicken broth (as needed)
- Noodles (as needed)
- Assorted vegetables: wood ear mushrooms, bok choy, sliced garlic, chopped green onions

Instructions:
1. In a pot, combine the chicken broth with a small amount of water. Add the sliced garlic and salt to taste. Heat the mixture until it is hot. Shred the chicken breast and add it to the broth.

2. In a separate pot, bring water to a boil. Blanch the bok choy and wood ear mushrooms until they are cooked. Remove them from the pot and set aside.

3. In the same pot of boiling water, cook the noodles until they are done. You can use fresh thin noodles from a local noodle shop or dried noodles.

4. To serve, place the cooked noodles in a bowl. Arrange the blanched bok choy and wood ear mushrooms on top. Pour the hot chicken broth over the noodles and vegetables. Garnish with chopped green onions and enjoy!

source: Title: 西红柿鸡蛋面, Ingredients: 1个西红柿 2个鸡蛋 1根葱花 1袋红烧牛肉面 10克豆油, Steps: 葱花切丁，西红柿切小块，起锅少油，下入葱花，西红柿，大火炒，放入一点水，把西红柿炒化，加入平时煮泡面的水量，等水开。 打入两个鸡蛋，等鸡蛋快熟了，下入泡面，酱包，蔬菜包，粉包，用筷子把泡面迅速滑散，散开后15s关火，捞出，这样方便面不会太软，吃着好吃 来吃非常美味
references: Title: Tomato and egg stir fry noodles, Ingredients: 1. 1 tomato 2. 2 eggs 3. 1 spring onion 4. 1 package ramen noodles 5. 10 ml vegetable oil 6. 1 bouillon cube 7. 1 tsp soy sauce 8. 1 tsp chilli sauce, Steps: 1. Finely slice the spring onion and the tomato.  2. Heat a pot over high heat, add the oil and fry the spring onion and the tomato until the tomato is soft. 3. Add 500 ml water. 4. When the water is boiling, crack the eggs and add them to the pot.  5. When the eggs are almost cooked, add the noodles, soy sauce, chilli sauce and the bouillon cube. 6. Stir the noodles well and turn off the heat after 15 seconds.  7. Serve hot and enjoy.
prediction:
Title: Tomato and Egg Noodle Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 medium tomato
- 2 large eggs
- 1 green onion
- 1 pack of beef-flavored instant noodles (with seasoning, vegetable, and powder packets)
- 10g (2 teaspoons) vegetable oil

Instructions:
1. Finely chop the green onion and set aside. Cut the tomato into small pieces.
2. Heat the vegetable oil in a medium-sized pot over high heat. Add the chopped green onion and tomato to the pot and stir-fry until the tomatoes soften.
3. Add a small amount of water to the pot and continue to cook the tomatoes until they break down and form a sauce.
4. Pour in the amount of water recommended on the instant noodle package and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Crack the two eggs into the boiling water and let them cook until they are almost fully set.
6. Add the instant noodles, seasoning packet, vegetable packet, and powder packet to the pot. Use chopsticks or a fork to quickly separate the noodles.
7. Once the noodles are separated, cook for an additional 15 seconds, then turn off the heat. Remove the noodles from the pot to prevent them from becoming too soft.
8. Serve the tomato and egg noodle soup immediately and enjoy this delicious dish!

source: Title: 番茄蛋汤, Ingredients: 1个番茄 1个鸡蛋 适量小葱 适量土豆生粉 各适量盐，香油，鸡精, Steps: 番茄洗净，头部切一个十字花刀。放在开水中氽烫一会儿，然后用自来水过凉，去皮。再切片备用。鸡蛋敲入碗中打散。香葱切圈备用。 锅置火上倒少许植物油，入番茄翻炒，再加入适量清水或高汤烧开，加入稀释好的土豆生粉，调均匀，用盐和鸡精调味儿，再淋入蛋液，待蛋液飘浮成片状时关火，淋几滴香油，撒上葱花，即刻出锅。
references: Title: tomato and egg soup, Ingredients: 1 tomato 1 egg 1 green onion bouillon salt potato starch , Steps: Blanch the tomato to remove the skin, then cut into slices. Break the egg in a bowl and whisk with a fork. Slice green onion into rings. In an oiled pot, cook tomato slices briefly, then add water or stock. Dilute potato starch in water then add slurry to the soup and mix well. Add salt and bouillon to taste. Drizzle egg mixture into the hot soup then turn off the heat. Add green onion and serve.
prediction:
Title: Tomato Egg Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 tomato
- 1 egg
- A handful of green onions (scallions)
- A small amount of potato starch (or cornstarch)
- Salt, sesame oil, and chicken bouillon powder, to taste

Instructions:
1. Rinse the tomato and cut a small "X" at the top. Blanch the tomato in boiling water for a few seconds, then rinse it under cold water to cool it down. Peel off the skin and slice the tomato. Set aside.
2. Crack the egg into a bowl and beat it well. Set aside.
3. Chop the green onions into small rings. Set aside.
4. In a pot, heat a small amount of vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the sliced tomato and stir-fry for a minute.
5. Add enough water or chicken broth to the pot to cover the tomatoes. Bring the mixture to a boil.
6. In a small bowl, mix the potato starch with a little water to create a slurry. Add the slurry to the pot, stirring well to combine.
7. Season the soup with salt and chicken bouillon powder to taste.
8. Slowly pour the beaten egg into the soup, stirring gently to create egg ribbons. Once the egg has cooked and is floating in the soup, turn off the heat.
9. Drizzle a few drops of sesame oil into the soup and sprinkle the chopped green onions on top.
10. Serve the soup immediately. Enjoy!

source: Title: 酸汤水饺, Ingredients: 适量水饺 2勺山西醋 1勺酱油 1勺香油 2勺辣子 1根香菜 1根葱, Steps: 准备材料的过程煮水，水开下速冻饺子 把所有的材料备好装大碗，吃面吃水饺必备的大碗，食材缺一不可，否则味道就不是这样的了，具体分量视个人喜好决定 注意扑锅，水开加两回冷水基本也就熟了 确认熟透直接倒入碗里 搅拌均匀开吃，超爽啊
references: Title: Sour dumpling soup, Ingredients: Frozen dumplings vinegar soy sauce chili sauce cilantro green onion, Steps: Boil water and cook frozen dumplings Combine seasoning to taste in a large soup bowl Add cooked dumplings with cooking water to the soup bowl and serve
prediction:
Title: Sour Soup Dumplings

Ingredients:
- A suitable amount of dumplings (frozen or homemade)
- 2 tablespoons Shanxi vinegar
- 1 tablespoon soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 2 tablespoons chili sauce or chili oil
- 1 sprig of cilantro
- 1 green onion

Instructions:
1. Prepare the ingredients. While doing so, bring a pot of water to a boil for cooking the dumplings.
2. Once the water is boiling, add the frozen dumplings to the pot. If using homemade dumplings, ensure they are properly sealed before adding them to the boiling water.
3. In a large serving bowl, combine the Shanxi vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil, and chili sauce or chili oil. This is the base for the sour soup. Adjust the amounts of each ingredient according to personal preference.
4. Chop the cilantro and green onion, then add them to the serving bowl with the sauce mixture.
5. To ensure the dumplings are cooked through, add cold water to the boiling pot twice during the cooking process. This will help regulate the temperature and prevent the dumplings from breaking apart.
6. Once the dumplings are fully cooked, use a slotted spoon to transfer them directly into the serving bowl with the sauce mixture.
7. Gently stir the dumplings in the sauce to ensure they are evenly coated.
8. Serve immediately and enjoy the delicious and refreshing sour soup dumplings!

source: Title: 香辣牛肉面, Ingredients: 二斤牛腩 三只番茄 若干葱姜蒜 除了花椒一小撮，其他各一个草果，大料，花椒，桂皮 一汤勺郫县豆瓣酱 两汤勺番茄酱 一小把冰糖 若干老抽生抽料酒, Steps: 牛腩切块焯水。表面杂质略干净，高汤留出备用。 另起锅，适量油，下入葱姜蒜，大料花椒草果爆香。接着下入郫县豆瓣酱，炒出红油，加入牛腩块翻炒。 牛肉煸炒微黄加入老抽，生抽，料酒翻炒均匀 加入番茄块，番茄酱，冰糖翻炒几下，连同之前的高汤一起倒入高压锅，上气小火压40分钟。 最后开盖放盐，大火收汁。吃面的话略微多一点汤，不要收的太浓稠 最后就是煮面条啦，来一个面碗，舀上几勺牛肉汤，把煮好的面条放进去，加一勺面汤，再来一勺牛肉，来点配菜或者香菜，开动吧
references: Title: spicy beef pasta, Ingredients: 2 kg beef brisket 3 tomatoes 1 onion 3 cloves garlic 2 tablespoon tomato paste 1 tsp sugar spaghetti or other long pasta parsley, Steps: Roughly chop beef brisket into small pieces Cook onion and garlic in olive oil until fragrant, then add beef and cook until the outside is browned. Add red wine, chopped tomato, tomato paste, and sugar, cover the pan and cook on low heat for 40 minutes until cooked. Cook pasta according to instructions. Serve with sauce and parsley to garnish.
prediction:
Title: Spicy Beef Noodle Soup

Ingredients:
- 2 lbs beef brisket
- 3 tomatoes
- A handful of green onions, ginger, and garlic
- A pinch of Sichuan peppercorns
- 1 black cardamom pod
- 1 star anise
- 1 small cinnamon stick
- 1 tablespoon Pixian Doubanjiang (broad bean paste)
- 2 tablespoons tomato ketchup
- A small handful of rock sugar
- A few splashes of dark soy sauce, light soy sauce, and Chinese cooking wine

Instructions:
1. Cut the beef brisket into chunks and blanch in boiling water to remove impurities. Drain and set aside, reserving the broth for later use.

2. In a separate pot, heat some oil and add the green onions, ginger, garlic, star anise, Sichuan peppercorns, and black cardamom. Stir-fry until fragrant. Then, add the Pixian Doubanjiang and continue to stir-fry until the oil turns red.

3. Add the beef chunks to the pot and stir-fry until slightly browned. Add the dark soy sauce, light soy sauce, and Chinese cooking wine, stirring to coat the beef evenly.

4. Add the chopped tomatoes, tomato ketchup, and rock sugar to the pot, stirring to combine. Pour in the reserved beef broth and transfer everything to a pressure cooker. Cook on low heat for 40 minutes.

5. After the pressure has released, open the lid and season with salt. Cook on high heat to reduce the sauce to your desired consistency. If serving with noodles, leave a bit more broth in the pot.

6. To serve, cook your choice of noodles according to package instructions. In a serving bowl, ladle some beef soup over the cooked noodles. Add a spoonful of the beef and sauce, and garnish with your choice of vegetables or cilantro. Enjoy!
